description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT (NPP) For Task Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) GSIN: D308 PROGRAMMING SERVICES Reference Number: 30003638 Solicitation Number: 30003638 Organization Name: Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) Solicitation Date: 2023-09-26 Closing Date: 2023-10-10 at 2:00 p.m. Eastern Daylight Saving Time EDT Anticipated Start Date: 2023-11-15 Estimated Delivery Date: N/A Estimate Level of Effort: Requires services of one (1) A.7 Programmer/Analyst  – 230 days Contract Duration: The contract period will be for one (1) year from the date of contract award. Solicitation Method: Competitive Applicable Trade Agreements: CFTA, Canada-Chile, Canada-Colombia, Canada-Korea, Canada-EU, WTO-AGP, Canada-Honduras, Canada-Peru, Canada-Panama Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement Applies: No Number of Contracts: 1 Requirement Details Tendering Procedure: Selective Tendering This requirement is open only to those TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who qualified under Tier 1 for services under the following category: A.7 Programmer/Analyst, level 3 - Senior The following SA Holders have been invited to submit a proposal: Net Solutions Inc. BDO Canada LLP Beyond Technologies Consulting Inc. Calian Ltd. Cistel Technology Inc. Conoscenti Technologies Inc. Eclipsys Solutions Inc. Maplesoft Consulting Inc. Mindwire Systems Ltd. Modis Canada Inc Neosoft Technologies Inc. OpenFrame Technologies, Inc. T.I.7 Inc. in Joint Venture with Tiree Consulting Inc. TEKsystems Canada Corp./Société TEKsystems Canada Templates 4 Business, Inc. All TBIPS SA Holders currently holding a TBIPS SA for Tier 1 under the EN578-170432 series of SA's are invited to bid on this requirement. Description of Work: The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) requires services of one (1) A.7 Programmer/Analyst, Level 3 to assist with the support of the Common Core and iFleet applications. Work activities will deal with configuration management, quality assurance, development (coding), implementation, and support of the national systems. Security Requirement: Common PS SRCL #06 applies Minimum Corporate Security Required: Designated Organization Screening (DOS) Minimum Resource Security Required: Reliability Status Contract Authority Name: Meenu Bhatia Email Address: DFO.Tenders-Soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca and cc: meenu.bhatia@dfo-mpo.gc.ca Inquiries Inquiries regarding this RFP requirement must be submitted to the Contracting Authority named above. Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed directly from the Contracting Authority to the Qualified Supply Arrangement Holders who are being invited to bid on this requirement.
duration_in_months: The contract period will be for one (1) year from the date of contract award.

full_summary:
### Invitation to Tender: A.7 Programmer/Analyst, Level 3 - Senior

#### Government of Canada - Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO)

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada invites bids for the provision of specialized services from a qualified A.7 Programmer/Analyst, Level 3 - Senior, to support the Common Core and iFleet applications.

#### Submission Details

* Solicitation Number: 30003638
* Closing Date: October 10, 2023, 2:00 p.m. Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
* Solicitation Date: September 15, 2023
* Estimated Contract Duration: One year from the contract award date

#### Description of Work

The selected candidate will be required to provide services for 230 days. The scope of work includes:

* Configuration management
* Quality assurance
* Development (coding)
* Implementation
* Support of national systems

The successful candidate must possess a high level of technical expertise and experience in the development and implementation of application software, as well as a solid understanding of software development methodologies and best practices.

#### Security Requirements

* Common PS SRCL #06 applies
* Minimum Corporate Security Required: Designated Organization Screening (DOS)
* Minimum Resource Security Required: Reliability Status

#### Trade Agreements

The tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

#### Contact Information

For inquiries, please contact Meenu Bhatia, Contracting Authority:

Email: [meenu.bhatia@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:meenu.bhatia@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
Phone: (613) 298-4795
Fax: None

#### Submission Requirements

Tender submissions must be prepared in accordance with the TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holder's qualification guidelines and the specifications of the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) contract.

The government reserves the right to negotiate with any supplier on this procurement. Only qualified TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who have been invited to submit a proposal will be considered. The deadline for submission is
